title: Zabbix LXC
textContent:
Zabbix LXC 
                Zabbix is an
                    all-in-one
                    monitoring solution with a variety of enterprise-grade features available right out of the box.
                To create a new Proxmox VE Zabbix LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell. 
                Copybash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/zabbix.sh)"
                ⚡ Default Settings: 4GB RAM - 6GB Storage - 2vCPU ⚡
                username: Admin password: zabbix
                Database credentials: cat zabbix.creds
                Zabbix Interface: IP/zabbix
outerHTML:
Zabbix LXC

Zabbix is an all-in-one monitoring solution with a variety of enterprise-grade features available right out of the box.

To create a new Proxmox VE Zabbix LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell. 

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/zabbix.sh)"

⚡ Default Settings: 4GB RAM - 6GB Storage - 2vCPU ⚡

username: Admin password: zabbix

Database credentials: cat zabbix.creds

Zabbix Interface: IP/zabbix
